The xaringan package is an R Markdown extension based on the JavaScript library [remark.js](https://remarkjs.com) to generate HTML5 presentations in different [themes](https://github.com/yihui/xaringan/tree/master/inst/rmarkdown/templates/xaringan/resources) ([Xie 2019](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/xaringan.html#ref-R-xaringan)).

You can learn more about the usage of the xaringan package from this excellent [documentation](http://slides.yihui.name/xaringan/), which is actually a set of slides generated from xaringan. 

Xie, Y. (2019). Xaringan: Presentation Ninja. [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=xaringan)
